sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 地震是一种严重的自然灾害。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dìzhèn shì yī zhǒng yánzhòng de zìrán zāihài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le tremblement de terre est une catastrophe naturelle grave.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: An earthquake is a serious natural disaster.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'est dirigé vers moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He walked towards me.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'ambiance de la fête était très animée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The atmosphere of the party was very lively.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他听到这个消息后非常愤怒。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tīngdào zhège xiāoxi hòu fēicháng fènnù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il était très en colère après avoir entendu cette nouvelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He was very angry after hearing this news.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他们之间发生了激烈的冲突。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen zhījiān fāshēng le jīliè de chōngtū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Un conflit intense a éclaté entre eux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A fierce conflict broke out between them.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa pensée est très flexible.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her thinking is very flexible.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这列火车有十二节车厢。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè liè huǒchē yǒu shí'èr jié chēxiāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce train a douze wagons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This train has twelve carriages.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bù liánxùjù hěn shòu huānyíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette série télévisée est très populaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This TV series is very popular.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les données montrent que les ventes ont augmenté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The data shows that sales have increased.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她特意为你准备了礼物。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tèyì wèi nǐ zhǔnbèi le lǐwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a spécialement préparé un cadeau pour toi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She specially prepared a gift for you.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le chinois a quatre tons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Chinese has four tones.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīshēng jǐnggào tā yào shǎo hējiǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin l'a averti de boire moins d'alcool.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor warned him to drink less alcohol.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime manger des cacahuètes grillées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to eat roasted peanuts.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai failli être en retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I almost arrived late.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez rester ici un moment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please stay here for a while.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez signer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sign here.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个故事讲的是一位勇敢的王子。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège gùshi jiǎng de shì yī wèi yǒnggǎn de wángzǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette histoire parle d'un prince courageux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This story is about a brave prince.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公司举办了一场盛大的宴会。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī jǔbàn le yī chǎng shèngdà de yànhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a organisé un grand banquet.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company held a grand banquet.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur guide patiemment les étudiants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher patiently guides the students.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les aliments frits ne sont pas très sains.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Fried food is not very healthy.
